name: Heroine's Claw (itch)
description:
My New Upcoming Game, Heroine's Claw Is An Indie Horror Game Based On An Abandoned Island Where You Have Won The Auction To The Luxury Gatefield Mansion Located On Tuscan Isle. But You Soon Find Out That You Aren't Alone In This Island, And Something Much More Sinister Lies Within The Mansions Walls.

Coming Soon...

Info For Environmental Demo!

If you experience lag there is an option to disable post processing if that helps!

Controls!

WASD - Forward, Left, Back, Right.

E - Interact With Doors

Left Mouse Button - Pickup Physics Objects

Escape - Pause Menu
